code: import React from"react";import Header from"../../components/header/Header";import Footer from"../../components/footer/Footer";import ProjectCard from"../../components/ProjectCard/ProjectCard";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import{projectsHeader,projects}from"../../portfolio.js";import"./Projects.css";import ProjectsImg from"./ProjectsImg";import{style}from"glamor";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Projects(props){var theme=props.theme;var styles=style({backgroundColor:"".concat(theme.accentBright),":hover":{boxShadow:"0 5px 15px ".concat(theme.accentBright)}});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-main",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{theme:theme,setTheme:props.setTheme}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"basic-projects",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{bottom:true,duration:2000,distance:"40px",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-heading-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"projects-heading-img-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectsImg,{theme:theme})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-heading-text-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"projects-heading-text",style:{color:theme.text},children:projectsHeader.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"projects-header-detail-text subTitle",style:{color:theme.secondaryText},children:projectsHeader["description"]})]})]})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"repo-cards-div-main",children:projects.data.map(function(repo,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProjectCard,{repo:repo,theme:theme},index);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{theme:props.theme,onToggle:props.onToggle})]});}export default Projects;
